mapper.sql: menu_id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, path, component, menu_type, visible, perms, icon, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark
mapper.select: SELECT m.menu_id, menu_name, parent_id FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu mr ON m.menu_id = mr.menu_id WHERE mr.role_id = #{roleId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.perms FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu mr ON m.menu_id = mr.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = mr.role_id WHERE m.menu_type = 'C' OR m.menu_type = 'F' AND ur.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_id, m.menu_name, m.perms, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.path, m.component, m.icon, m.menu_type, m.visible FROM sys_menu m LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu mr ON m.menu_id = mr.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = mr.role_id WHERE m.menu_type = 'M' OR m.menu_type = 'C' AND ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY m.order_num
